TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RangeValidator extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 驗證另一個控制項的值落在允許的範圍內。

span.span: Validates that another control's value falls within an allowable range.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小和最大值的範圍會提供直接或參考另一個控制項。The minimum and maximum values of the range are provided either directly or by reference to another control. 這個類別的行為即會相同與控制項。This class behaves identically to the control. 根據預設，表單上的控制項引發時要執行驗證表單提交給伺服器表單上的驗證程式控制項。By default, controls on a form raise validator controls on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server. 若要停用自動驗證，請設定屬性至`false`。To disable automatic validation, set the property on the to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性驗證輸入的數值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to validate a numerical value entered into a . > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MaximumValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定正在驗證之控制項的值，該值必須小於或等於這個屬性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the control that you are validating, which must be less than or equal to the value of this property.

summary.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

value.span: 要對其進行驗證之範圍的最大值。

span.span: The maximum value of the range to validate against.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性驗證輸入的數值控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to validate a numerical value entered into a control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MinimumValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定正在驗證之控制項的值，該值必須大於或等於這個屬性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the control that you are validating, which must be greater than or equal to the value of this property.

summary.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

value.span: 要對其進行驗證之範圍的最小值。

span.span: The minimum value of the range to validate against.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性驗證輸入的數值控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to validate a numerical value entered into a control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType Type { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料型別，指定如何解譯正在比較的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the data type that specifies how to interpret the values being compared.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

value.span: 資料型別，指定如何解譯正在比較的值。

span.span: The data type that specifies how to interpret the values being compared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行比較之前，這些值隱含轉換成指定的資料類型。The values are implicitly converted to the specified data type before the comparison is made. 如果資料轉換失敗，資料驗證失敗。If the data conversion fails, data validation fails. 下表包含的定義列舉型別。The following table contains the definitions of the enumerations. |列舉Enumerations|值Value|資料類型Data Type| |------------------|-----------|---------------| |StringString|00|StringString| |整數Integer|11|整數Integer| |DoubleDouble|22|DoubleDouble| |日期Date|33|DateTimeDateTime| |貨幣Currency|44|貨幣Currency|

exception.span: 指定的值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.
